titleStmt.title: England's preservation or, a sermon discovering the onely way to prevent destroying judgements: preached to the Honourable House of Commons at their last solemne fast, being on May, 25. 1642. By Obadiah Sedgwicke Batchelour in Divinity and minister of Coggeshall in Essex. Published by order of that house.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. B. for Samuel Gellibrand, at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at the late fast, before the Commons house of Parliament.
The first leaf is blank. -- Cf. Jeffs. English Revolution, v.3, p.3.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-Yard
